frame.name: People_by_jurisdiction
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains words for individuals, i.e. humans, who are governed by virtue of being registered in a certain <fen>Jurisdiction</fen>. Alternatively, they may be conceptualized with respect to their governance by a political or religious <fen>Authority</fen> They may have an <fen>Age</fen>, <fen>Descriptor</fen>, <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen>, or <fen>Ethnicity</fen>.
<ex>A <fex name="Ethnicity">Somali</fex> <t>national</t> entered our office.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Jurisdiction
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Jurisdiction</fen> is the place where the <fen>Person</fen> typically resides and by whose <fen>Authority</fen> he is governed.</def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Person</fen> which is concieved of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Person</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Person</fen> has been alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Person</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Authority
FE.definition: <def-root>The politically or religiously legitimated persons who govern the <fen>Jurisdiction</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: citizen.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a legally recognized subject of a political jurisdiction, typically a nation

lexUnit.name: parishioner.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person who belongs to a particular Church parish

lexUnit.name: national.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a citizen of a particular country.

lexUnit.name: subject.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a member of a state owing allegiance to its monarch or supreme ruler

lexUnit.name: citizenry.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a whole body of citizens
